sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: mCherry
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: monomeric derivative of DsRed fluorescent protein (Shaner et al., 2004)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: mCherry
lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lac operator
SV40 NLS
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: SV40 NLS
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: nuclear localization signal of SV40 (simian virus 40) large T antigen

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: bacterial operator O2 for the tetR and tetA genes

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: Plasmid for expression of NLS-mCherry (control plasmid). Confers resistance to Puromycin. Expression is inducible in T-REx cells.
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Plasmid for expression of NLS-mCherry (control plasmid). Confers resistance to Puromycin. Expression is inducible in T-REx cells..
